original_text: And Jehu drew a bow with his full strength, and smote Jehoram between his arms, and the arrow went out at his heart, and he sunk down in his chariot.
korean_text: 예후가 힘을 다하여 활을 당겨 요람의 두 팔 사이를 쏘니 화살이 그의 염통을 꿰뚫고 나오매 그가 병거 가운데에 엎드러 진지라

sentences.original_text: And Jehu drew a bow with his full strength,
and smote Jehoram between his arms,
and the arrow went out at his heart,
and he sunk down in his chariot.
